actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of the portion of certain charges which is allocable to the construction and maintenance of waste treatment works.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for that portion of real property taxes assessed against local benefits of a kind tending to increase the value of the property assessed which are properly allocable to the construction, maintenance, or finance costs of sewage treatment plants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of the portion of certain charges which is allocable to the construction and maintenance of waste treatment works.
